meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'gena', referring to the cheek or side of the face.
meanings.sent1: She gently touched her genas to feel the warmth of her cheeks.
meanings.sent2: His genas flushed with embarrassment when he realized his mistake.
meanings.sent3: The baby's chubby genas were irresistible for pinching.
meanings.sent4: Her genas glowed pink from the cold wind's kiss.
meanings.sent5: The clown painted colorful designs on the children's genas at the party.
